get.description:
List issues.
List all issues across all the authenticated user's visible repositories.

parameters.description:
Issues assigned to you / created by you / mentioning you / you're
subscribed to updates for / All issues the authenticated user can see
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: String list of comma separated Label names. Example - bug,ui,@high.
parameters.name: labels

parameters.description:
Optional string of a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.
Only issues updated at or after this time are returned.
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: You can check the current version of media type in responses.
parameters.name: X-GitHub-Media-Type

parameters.description: Is used to set specified media type.
parameters.name: Accept

403.description:
API rate limit exceeded. See http://developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting
for details.

get.description: Find repositories by keyword. Note, this legacy method does not follow the v3 pagination pattern. This method returns up to 100 results per page and pages can be fetched using the start_page parameter.

parameters.description: The search term
parameters.name: keyword

parameters.description: The sort field. if sort param is provided. Can be either asc or desc.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Filter results by language
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: The page number to fetch
parameters.name: start_page

parameters.description: The sort field. One of stars, forks, or updated. Default: results are sorted by best match.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: You can check the current version of media type in responses.
parameters.name: X-GitHub-Media-Type

parameters.description: Is used to set specified media type.
parameters.name: Accept

403.description:
API rate limit exceeded. See http://developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting
for details.
